prompts.title: Complete Business Plan Generator
prompts.prompt: Create a comprehensive business plan for [BUSINESS IDEA] including: 1) Executive Summary, 2) Market Analysis with competitor research, 3) Marketing Strategy with channels and budget, 4) Financial Projections (3-year), 5) Operations Plan, 6) Risk Assessment, 7) Funding Requirements

prompts.title: High-Converting Email Sequence
prompts.prompt: Write a 7-email sequence for [PRODUCT/SERVICE] targeting [AUDIENCE]. Each email should: 1) Have a compelling subject line, 2) Personal opening, 3) Value-focused body, 4) Clear CTA, 5) P.S. line. Include send schedule.

prompts.title: Investor Pitch Deck Generator
prompts.prompt: Create a 10-slide pitch deck for [STARTUP] including: 1) Problem, 2) Solution, 3) Market Size (TAM/SAM/SOM), 4) Business Model, 5) Traction, 6) Competition Matrix, 7) Team, 8) Financials, 9) Ask, 10) Vision
